attributes.action: Give NHS workers the pay rise they deserve
attributes.additional_details: Covid 19 has shown how much the NHS is the backbone to the health of this country. Thanks to the NHS, 21M adults have been vaccinated this year. Conserve it, invest in it, incentivise people to join it and stay in it. It is a great and precious asset.
attributes.background: NHS workers have gone beyond the call of duty in the pandemic. Without their commitment and dedication, many more lives would have been lost. It is time to show how much we value their contribution and pay them properly. Anything less than a 7% pay rise is woefully inadequate.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Provide a Pay increase of 7% to all our NHS workers fighting COVID19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568373
